Blackstorm:

Blackstorm looked to Kitkat, she sighed and followed Maxima. She 
decided that it was the best for all 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima nodded. "Those skills need to be honed in. Your programming 
would 
> enhance that." 
> 
> She stood straight. "You are a Predacon, a Decepticon decendent," 
in some 
> ways, a decendent of her & her comrades. "You are NOT a beast, but 
an 
> instrument of destruction. Some Predacons have perhaps lost the 
devotion it 
> took to be a Decepticon. I'm NOT a beast, Blackstorm. I am a 
Decepticon. 
> Unfortunately, in some Predacon lookalike form." She was more 
speaking about 
> the Predacons she once knew. Their animalistic fury was famous. 
But the 
> majority of these so called Predacons made the name sake a joke. 
She would 
> rather be known as a Decepticon. For that is what she still is.
> 
> Motioning for Blackstorm to come to her, "Stop trying to 'think'. 
Access your 
> data banks & files. If you are a Predacon or Decepticon, you will 
function 
> more as a bot, a true Cybertronian. Not some pathetic organic 
beast."
